Brigantine Sivan bill of lading 1977.447
0.05 Linear Feet in one folder
1759 A bill of lading for one chest of merchandise and one enslaved person to be delivered to the Port of Monto Cristo by Captain John Waddell, Jr. on board the Brigantine Sivan (or Swan) leaving from the Harbor of New York, N.Y. The document is dated October 20, 1759. A0070
Conditions Governing Access
